node.statement: PATH A: FINITE SUBORDINATION + L2 CONTRACTION (Primary path). Adapt Shlyakhtenko-Tao to finite polynomials. Construct subordination omega_p, omega_q with G_r = G_p(omega_p) = G_q(omega_q). Use chain rule H_r(lambda_i) = H_p(mu_sigma(i)) - alpha_i to get L2 Pythagoras decomposition. Prove harmonic mean from Herglotz coupling of correction vectors.
